definition: too busy/to have no time for/fully occupied

sentences.english: Supposedly, the fabled perfection of art began by mirroring the faultless beauty of nature.
sentences.chinese: 我们猜想，艺术虚构的完美是对无暇的自然美的反映。

sentences.english: They say she is as pure as Psyche.
sentences.chinese: 大家都说她像普绪客一样纯洁无暇。

sentences.english: All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.
sentences.chinese: 洗我洁净，使我完全再无暇。

sentences.english: As for anything about the post-Gaddafi situation, we have not addressed that point.
sentences.chinese: 至于卡扎菲下台后的状况，我们还无暇顾及。

sentences.english: Mrs Zhang Qishan official business is busy, busy home often feel.
sentences.chinese: 张启山公务繁忙，经常无暇顾及家里夫人的感受。

sentences.english: Will lose will elapse surely, even if will return, also not like before had no time.
sentences.chinese: 失去的必定会逝去，纵然回归，也不会如以前无暇。

sentences.english: It always seems like you are running here and there, often much too fast, often never noticing the truly grand things in life.
sentences.chinese: 你们总是来去匆匆，无暇顾及生命真正辉煌之所在。

sentences.english: Overachievers are busy doing their own thing to worry about such superficial issues.
sentences.chinese: 办公室超人埋头于自己的事，无暇为琐事担忧。

sentences.english: He helped himself and we were too busy to stop him.
sentences.chinese: 他自斟自饮，我们也无暇阻止他。

sentences.english: To regain the happiness of childhood, like a treasure heart.
sentences.chinese: 重拾童年的美好，心灵无暇像块宝。

sentences.english: Somehow I doubt that "overwhelming interest" is the problem.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎的，我怀疑“无暇顾及”就是问题所在。

sentences.english: Lotus in different poses and with different expressions, the pure white, pure as crystal.
sentences.chinese: 荷花千姿百态，洁白无暇，像水晶一样纯洁。

sentences.english: We are surrounded by them every day but, people are too busy to see them.
sentences.chinese: 即使我们天天被快乐围绕，但也因为太忙而无暇顾及。

sentences.english: The entire block is white, clean.
sentences.chinese: 整个街区银装素裹，洁白无暇。

sentences.english: We’ve been trained by movies and TV to worship perfection.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经被电影和电视培养成完美无暇的崇拜者。

sentences.english: Be in charge of paint, in a thin biscuit sketched by pure love.
sentences.chinese: 执管挥毫，在薄薄的素坯上勾勒出洁白无暇的爱情。

definition: there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
to have no time (for sth)/to be too busy (to do sth)
wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
to get away from/to withdraw/to free oneself
to fail to pay sufficient attention to/to be negligent in regard to/to be lacking in
not to have access/beyond one's authority or capability/sth one has no way of doing
